website_summaries.verdict: For short- or long-term wine storage, this freestanding refrigerator cools down quickly and keeps favorite bottles at the ready.
pros: Has a sleek, stylish appearance that blends in well with most decor
Relatively compact and easy to tuck away without being intrusive
Maintains its temperature regardless of how many or few bottles are inside
cons: Not a dual temperature cooler, so may not chill both reds and whites as effectively together

customer_reviews.title: Great Product + How to change the temp. settings.
customer_reviews.text: High Quality, runs quietly and arrived as expected. One thing We had to learn by punching buttons was to change the temperature, hold the unlock button down while moving the temperature controls up and down. We hope this helps. Best Wishes
customer_reviews.author: MarineWife

customer_reviews.title: 750 ml Pinot Noir bottles do not fit 3 across; very limiting.
customer_reviews.text: The unit performs well for its intended use. However, it will not take 18 bottles of wine as advertised. The bottles must be of thin width like Cab and Syrah to fit. However, my wine is Pinot Noir which comes in slightly bigger bottles. When I can get three bottles across, I have to wedge the last bottle in and the bottle could crack or break. So, I'm disappointed that the description of the product did not make this limitation clear.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Stripling

customer_reviews.title: but very happy the company stands behind their product and reached out
customer_reviews.text: The original wine cooler did not work. After giving a not so glowing review, I received a call from the company who offered their apologies and offered to send another one for free. Well, it arrived and is working perfectly now. Something must have been wrong with the digital read out on the original cooler, but very happy the company stands behind their product and reached out. Happy with the new cooler, and so are the wines.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Its way quieter than our previous one and looks beautiful. My only complaint is the lights for temp are on the outside and are a bit bright, its like a night right really. We have another where those lights are in the inside, perhaps newer versions of this could incorporate that. When it arrived it was missing a leg which left an exposed screw on the bottom. The company was VERY responsive and sent me a new leg very quickly. Overall, I am very happy with this purchase and the company.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product to ruin your wine.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this thing for less than 3 weeks. The first 2 weeks was ok then the last few days the temp fluctuates. It is set at 57 and yesterday it went up to 61 allllllll day. Then this morning it went back down and now it’s back at 60. And the customer service is horrible as well. I had a safety issue with my handle because it had a gouge/nick in it and requested a replacement. After several emails and back and forths, they said they would replace it. They said it would ship on Monday. That was 2 weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unhelpful in my attempt to exchange defective item.
customer_reviews.text: DeBroth kept telling me they were not receiving my return emails. This was true even when I had the representative stay on the line until he received my return email requesting a replacement item. When I spoke to him next he denied receiving the very email he acknowledged receiving during our prior conversation.
customer_reviews.author: esm

customer_reviews.title: Died early death
customer_reviews.text: Went dead after 3 months. No obvious place to get help. Contacted support via the Amazon button provided, which turned out to be someone reading the troubleshooting guide from the manufacturer which I already had, and which contained the wisdom that a fuse in my electrical system may have blown. Seriously??? Support is only available by the manufacture by phone during business hours Some reviewers are apparently lucky to have units that make it longer than 3 month, but from what I see this is a mediocre product, poor support. Perhaps better if you buy directly and not via Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Crooked door
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time as expected. However, it was kinda dusty regardless that it was bagged. The top right corner of the door wall mounted crooked. It's slanted to the left by about a 1/4 inch. I don't know how it would even made it through QC. Since I was too lazy to repack and return, so I decided to keep it. I was kinda disappointed, with all the good reviews I read before the purchase and I ended up with a crooked door cooler. Besides that, it's working like it should so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tam V.

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT STAY COOL
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a few months. Noticed that it doesn't stay cool AT ALL. I set the temperature, and it just matches the indoor temp of the home. The light also flickers and it tripped an electrical switch when I tried to keep it in the garage. I have reached out to customer service twice. Hoping to get a refund. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Day

customer_reviews.title: This wine cooler works very well!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a desert area (Phoenix AZ), and the front part of my house, where the wine cooler is located, gets hotter and stays hotter than the rest of the house for most of the day. This unit keeps the temperature at a very steady 58 degrees the entire day. The thermoelectric chiller is slower to cool than the compressor models, but it more than makes up for that in quietness. I have the 18 bottle unit, and when I added 4 bottles last Friday, the interior temp jumped to 62degrees, but then got back down to 58 degrees in about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This unit arrived in perfect condition. It is easy to set up. The temperature is easy to adjust. It is very quiet. Others have said that large bottles do not fit well (which, in my experience, is not unusual for a wine storage unit), but all 18 of my wine bottles fit just fine. It is tight, however, and I would agree that an oversized bottle might well create some issues. The unit is inconspicuous, very quiet, and so far, very efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Follow up Review
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this cooler for four months. It just died for no reason. I had 30 days to return it, but Im stuck with it now. Avoid this cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Unit doesn't maintain it's tempurature
customer_reviews.text: The unit has a good form factor and is good size for apartments that do not have a lot of space. The unit is also very quiet, I don't really recall hearing it run. It was also one of the few units that had a lock, which I wanted for bottles that I didn't want anyone to accidentally open. However, I don't recommend this unit for two reasons, 1) it is supposed to fit 18 bottles but you have to fight to get bottles of varying shapes to fit 2) the unit does not maintain it's tempurature when my apartment gets warm. I have it set at 54 degrees but it goes up to as high as 62 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Dorian Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Dead!
customer_reviews.text: We liked this cooler while it worked, but it died at the point of no return right as the warranty expired. We have owned wine coolers that lasted for years, so we expected more than 12 months out of this one! It was not run in a garage or extreme temperatures, so our suggestion would be to save your money and invest in something that will last!
customer_reviews.author: jack g

customer_reviews.title: The temperature control.
customer_reviews.text: Love this wine cooler! It is the perfect fit for me because I needed something small enough to fit in the only space I had. We recently went to Italy & purchased delicious bottles of wine & I didn't want to keep them in a wine rack. When I found this wine cooler online it had everything I needed!
customer_reviews.author: Dolores C.

customer_reviews.title: Handle off. Good Luck
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the door had to be installed and the screws provided were wrong for the unit. The whole unit was packaged great. Don’t understand why they did not have the handle on. Too late to send back after you open up. I could get the screws sent to me which might take a month or they suggested I go to the hardware store which I did. Still not fitting properly. Every time I open the refrigerator I will be pissed that I had to deal with this. Learned my lesson. Will not order these types of items again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This never worked.  The lights come on but it doesn't cool down.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a remodel and it was in the box for a few months. Once the contractor unpacked it and set it up, we realized it looked like it was working but it wasn't cooling at all. Maybe the fan doesn't work? I don't know. Now it's too late to return it and the "support window" has shut down, as well. A waste of $160.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Deurloo

customer_reviews.title: This product will ruin your wine!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if you care about your wine. The unit has a strong and persistent VOC odor that appears to come from the cooling unit. I have been running mine with the door open for three days trying to salvage this purchase. No luck so far. There is little doubt that this strong odor would penetrate the cork and ruin the wine in any bottled stored in this unit for more than a brief period. It is bewildering to me that this product was recommended by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: CH in VA

customer_reviews.title: Great Medicine Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Medicine was taking up too much space in food refrigerator. Pharmacy always sends me 3 month supply & Costco's supplements are in large bottles. I removed the wine racks in this wine cooler and made some flat stainless steel mesh shelving. Works wonderful. Nice DRY cool interior. Very quiet. The construction is solid, being mostly glass and steel. Highly recommend. Packaged properly to prevent any shipping damage. Quality throughout.
customer_reviews.author: Gary E. Ensmenger

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, its sleek and elegant. Wish it was a bit taller. It does not hold 18 bottles. I collect Pinot, base of bottle bigger. I have to place some bottles in backward, some forward. The space between shelf are small. But tempted dark glass looks good. I live where it get 106 degree outside, so the cooler regulate to temperature of your home. The cooler is very quite. I give 4 for looks and 3.5 for functionality.
customer_reviews.author: san

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good..........
customer_reviews.text: Received the item on time through FEDEX. Good shipping; no damage. Easy to un-pack and set up. Adjusting feet underneath makes it stable and solid. It reached 58o in about two hours, holding steady. No noise; seems easy to use. Only problem was the screws for the door handle seem too short. therefore am unable to attach the door handle. I plan to call the help number tomorrow to see what's wrong. Otherwise I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie B

customer_reviews.title: Poor paint job
customer_reviews.text: Paint missing? Packaging looked great, but has this issue. Now I have to hide this item in a corner instead. Not noisier than my synology diskstation. And its a low humming noise. Would not use in a bedroom. Looks okay otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Fusistech

customer_reviews.title: Packing was good. Unit arrived damaged in the box.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. Packing was good. Box was not damaged but when the unit was unwrapped I noticed two large dents in the top. There were no dents on the box so it must have been dented at the factory. Ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: B. McGuigan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wine fridge!
customer_reviews.text: This is our 1st. We did a lot of reading as well as talking with individuals about the pros & cons of single vs dual zone fridges. Most we spoke to agreed that a single zone is fine. fWe use it for both reds and whites. We keep the temp at 56, perfect for red and then when we know we'll be drinking white, we'll pull it out and just put it in the regular fridge for about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Bought several months ago and is working fine
customer_reviews.text: I had been warned that these don’t keep whites cold enough and it doesn’t, at least not cold enough to drink. It only goes down to 54 degrees, but it’s consistent and I just put whites in my reg fridge before drinking. I have it in an open area to keep it from overheating. Pretty quiet operation too. It is very small, but it’s a great value for 18 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great concept but falls down after 6 months of light use.
customer_reviews.text: The temperature controls are flaky, sometimes you can increase or decrease the temps other times not and the LED display now only shows part of the number so you get to guess what temp it is on. Manual doesn’t help much as to how to fix with out it costing as much as the unit Although the warranty is one year, if you want it replaced you need to ship it back at your expense and they will let you fill out forms to determine if it is under warranty. Would not purchase this again knowing what I know.
customer_reviews.author: Kanasatka

customer_reviews.title: had it 1 yr and its junk
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this wine cooler last year. At first it worked great and we were excited to have it. Around the 1 yr mark it started to increase in temperature. it no longer keeps our wine cold. I called customer service, went through all trouble shooting and was advised to email the company. I was sent back a response of no help since we were out of the 1 yr warranty time. Very disappointed in this product. I would not recommend purchasing it, doesn't last. Plus their customer service was not helpful. Don't waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed !
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing I read all the reviews. I was expecting difficulty in setting it up. Read the instructions, set the temperature and everything is up and running like clockwork. Very impressed with the style, it is attractive and functional.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Won't get below 60 degrees after running for almost two weeks
customer_reviews.text: We have had this plugged in and running for almost 2 weeks in our air conditioned home, and it has never dropped down to the 54 degrees we set it to. It has never gotten below 60 degrees, usually hovers in the mid to low 60s. Did we get a lemon? Wider bottles - like prosecco/champagne bottles - don't fit, but only by a matter of a few millimeters. If the shelves were just ever so slightly further apart, and ever so slightly wider, they would be able to accommodate all common 750ml bottle shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie PK

customer_reviews.title: 4.8 stats but I’m happy for the price
customer_reviews.text: I liked this unit. Packaging isn’t so great One of the two arrived with a small dent but not that noticeable. The temperature will fluctuate if the ambient room temperature is not stable. Mine are currently in my garage and I live in Southern California, in the garage gets over 85° I’ve noticed the temperature in the coolers will fluctuate a few degrees But I’m very happy I will probably buy a couple more. The bottles fit nicely in the front panels very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: overstockAV.com

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful but no way I can get it cool enough ...
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful but no way I can get it cool enough and yes I have checked surrounding and it is not too warm in the room. I bit disappointed that I cant control the temperature better. That should be the purpose of a wine cooler you think. But I can't send it back. Too much work....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Operation
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a wine cooler and this model fits the bill! Maintains a even temperature. Not too small and not too big. I put it right next to our breakfast nook table and you cannot hear it running when sitting very close to it. The lock feature is a little confusing and have not figured it out yet. I like the blue lighting inside so you can see what you have when selecting the wine of choice to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chiller
customer_reviews.text: At first, I wasn’t sure because it wouldn’t come on. I had to unplug it and replug it in and it worked fine. It goes to 54 which I wish it went cooler, but it is clearly stated that’s the lowest. I have it under my coffee bar i front of my window and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: April Patterson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It took over 24 hours to get down to temperature, but it seems to be holding it now (54 degrees, I live in SoCal). I have only had it a few weeks, though.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Cooler/Chiller
customer_reviews.text: We really like this new addition in our home. We have recently joined two wine clubs and want the wine to be the correct temperature when we have company or want to enjoy. No noise, constant temperature and the wine is at perfect temperature. We haven't needed the lock feature because our two spoiled dogs have not figured out how to open it and our kids are grown, but it is nice to know the lock feature is there. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Harding

customer_reviews.title: The box was delivered upside down, despite the clear ...
customer_reviews.text: The box was delivered upside down, despite the clear markings about how it should be handled. Once opened, we saw that the face of the unit was damaged. A representative of the seller contacted me immediately about this and provided me options. The unit seems to be working fine so I opted to keep it. Kudos to the seller for being so customer friendly. Despite the rough trip this thing took, so far (a few days into it) I can attest that it is a good looking appliance (the style, the light, size, etc.) and the controls are really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Horton

customer_reviews.title: Item came on time and packed very good. Was easy to set up and directions easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Item came on time and packed very good. Was easy to set up and directions easy to follow. I have had it for just over a week and the temperature has held steady. It runs very quite and so far very pleased. Hopefully it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: James Terragnoli

customer_reviews.title: Temperature is not low enough for white wine.
customer_reviews.text: We sent it back. It states its is a red and white wine cooler but lowest temp is 54. Not appropriate for white wine. White wine should be 45. We purchased another cooler that actually goes to 41 degrees and we are much happier. Your cooler is fine for red but not white wine.
customer_reviews.author: Chere G. Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: Aside from a small delivery glitch (upside down, small dent in rear of unit), it works as promised. I've only had it two weeks, so check in with me in two years and that's a better judge of this device. Nonetheless, steady 55 degrees, quiet, looks good in my home office next to my work desk, I usually forgot that its there. I bought if after I saw two favorable reviews on Wirecutter (NY Times) and Forbes.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Compact and sleek
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little budget wine fridge. It's the perfect size for our tiny apartment, and it looks nice with its tinted dark door. I will say that the blue light is SUPER bright, we have to cover it at night because it lights up our whole apartment otherwise. Temperature control works great and the fan is very quiet when it kicks on.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, worked well out of the box
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, worked well out of the box, came to temp in a few hours. Display works well so far. Only took a star away for operating sound, definitely not silent. Satisfied overall.
customer_reviews.author: J. Myers

customer_reviews.title: 3.2 diameter loses
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look and the silence but today I put some larger diameter whites into it or try to put them in and they all lost their labels. This is made for a 3.0 diameter wine bottles but so many whites now are coming in at 3.2 diameter. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CDB

customer_reviews.title: Keeps a constant temp
customer_reviews.text: This Ivation 18 Bottle Thermoelectric wine cooler arrived promptly in perfect condition and was very well packaged. The unit just needed leveling with the bottom pads and time to reach the desired temperature. Once loaded, it needed some time to return to the temp we'd set it to. We keep it at 54 degrees and the digital readout has stayed constant. It is attractive, takes little space, and is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Wine Fridge
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small good wine fridge and this one has been great. It's easy to set up and works well! I was trying to decide between this one and the dual temperature one and ultimately I'm glad I went with this one....I think it's just a tad small to try to get all fancy with dual temp zones. But overall, we're happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Williams

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: It's quiet, compact, easy to set up, and looks good. Only problem I have is that the larger diameter wine bottles don't fit easily into each slot. For example, you can't put three of them side by side. And I'm not talking about sparkling wine bottles, just the bottle style that's slightly shorter and wider than the other common bottle type. Only a real problem if all your bottles are this size/shape. I am likely going to order a second one because overall I like the first one, and a second one will fit nicely into the available space in my man room.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wine Cooler for Smaller Space
customer_reviews.text: Thus is the perfect wine fridge/cooler for our downsized island home. We have a screened -in lanai that was just too humid for any wine storage. This unit is the perfect, smart looking, and keeps the right temperature for the bottles we keep in hand. Once it reaches its desired temperature, you can’t hear it running or humming at all.
customer_reviews.author: R. Sabersky

customer_reviews.title: Good budget cooler for a relatively cool space
customer_reviews.text: This does a good job if it’s in a room that is already below about 70 degrees F. If the room gets much warmer, like 75-76 degrees F, the fridge can only handle dropping the temp by 10-15 degrees tops.
customer_reviews.author: B4E1

customer_reviews.title: Operates as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived on time and undamaged. Very nice looking unit. I placed 11 standard bottles(room temp) inside once I powered it on. It took about 9-10hrs to reach 55f from 75f(ambient) and was very quiet while doing so. It has been rock steady on 55 since it reached it. It has been running for 2 days. I will edit this should anything change. The only reason I'm giving 4 stars instead of 5 is, it was a missing a foot. I checked the packaging in case it fell off during shipping. Didn't find it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Frige!
customer_reviews.text: The Ivation works exactly as described. When cooler is first plugged in, it takes about 6 to 8 hours to reach the preset temperatures for your red and white wines. The motor is quiet, the cabinet attractive. With the hot temperatures we've been experiencing this summer, I no longer have to be concerned about our wine being ruined by excessive heat.
customer_reviews.author: J-Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great with one flaw...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great small space option. So far it seems to be keeping even temperature. It is extremely quiet, an important feature as ours is exposed in an open kitchen/living/dining setup. The drawback which keeps it from getting five stars is the size of the racks. They are really narrow. We have bottles that are too big to fit in, which kind of defeats the purpose of buying it in the first place. Eventually we will need to find something with better storage options.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer F.

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly, right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Our old wine fridge died recently. The compressor got very hot and then quit. Scary. So the new Ivation 18 is a replacement. After reading the owners manual , I plugged it in. Worked perfectly. Temp went down to the 57 degrees I set in an hour. Silent running. Looks great. This is day one, but if it keeps going like this, it will be a great buy. Highly recommended for those who want to get your wine out of the family fridge. And, this model does not have a compressor! So, less worry. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: superjim

customer_reviews.title: Good performance - top dented twice
customer_reviews.text: We like the product so far....we had to send the first one back because the top, back corner was badly dented. The second one arrived, and again was dented in same spot but not enough for us to worry about shipping it back yet again. It works fine though...and is exactly what we wanted in our space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works very well. Holds chill well. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: works very well. Holds chill well. I have only one complaint....the light that displays the temp is so bright it lights the whole room.
customer_reviews.author: Snowdiva

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, but tight fit for what it says it holds
customer_reviews.text: Edited to add: I contacted company & they replaced the shelving. Thank you so much. Original review: I purchased the 18 bottle wine fridge, and although it does hold 18 bottles it’s a tight fit and they don’t slide easily out. Temperature control works nicely, and has maintained a steady 55 degrees, as my preferred temperature. When I opened the box all was packaged nicely except for the shelving which was packed inside the unit & movement during shipping had broken 2 shelves completely. See photos. If shelves would have arrived intact I would have given this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: TX Mama

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product at the beginning of this month for a wedding shower and the bride reached out to me and said it was damaged. So, I returned the cooler and re-purchased it. Unfortunately, the second one was also damaged. I am working on getting this returned for a second time, and will not purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kacy Rozwadowski

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Bought a wine fridge from JC Penny a few years ago and it kicked the bucket so I needed a new one..this one is absolutely amazing! Fits a great amount of bottles and temperature control works great
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This is a stylish, well-designed, functional, quiet and capable wine chiller. The digital display and smoked-glass door are modern options that add to the exceptional performance of this wine cooler/cellar product. The temperature can be set according to your specific wine type or preference. Also, there is a switch to turn interior lighting on and off when you need to view your wine stock or wine selection inside. Storing/cellaring wine at the proper temperature and environment is key to enjoying the best in fine wine. This product delivers great performance when you need to store your wine investment.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Greatest little cooler yet
customer_reviews.text: Although it only holds 18 bottles, it does so at a constant temperature without a variance between the top and bottom shelves. I have not found that to be the case in the 24 and 35 bottle other branded units. Also you CAN maneuver the bottles around to squeeze in some larger burgundy bottles as log as you get this wire shelf unit and not its cousin with the wooden shelves. I am very pleased with this unit. VERY quiet and do not veer hear it.
customer_reviews.author: beth hirsch

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design, quiet, and great temperature control
customer_reviews.text: Great looking wine cooler with consistent temperature that runs quietly. I bought the 18 bottle model to accommodate 12 larger Pinot Noir bottles. If Pinot Noir is your wine, you will need to either remove every other shelf or use a staggering strategy so that the bottles are not facing the same way. This is true for pretty much all wine coolers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Toodles

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a dent on the side and the company gave me a nice price cut so I wouldn't have to try to return/replace it. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SocalTina

customer_reviews.title: Chills wine
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price- looks good for the price compared to more expensive models I've seen at the Big Box stores. It's more quiet than my small fridge I use as a beer fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Wine Refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator is very quiet. My only quibble is that the wire shelves are sometimes a little balky, especially with larger bottles. Still, we liked it well enough to buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Temperature not accurate, doesn’t get cold enough.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is quiet and sleek looking, but the internal temperature does not reflect the digital control. I found it was not getting my champagne chilled enough with the setting at 54 degrees and measured the internal temp with an external thermometer. The fluctuation over the past month has shown internally 55-57 degrees, typically 57. Disappointed that it’s not serving the purpose for which we purchased and providing reliable temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Wine Cellar
customer_reviews.text: The wine cellar arrived on time and as advertised. It looks great and seems to work well. I've only had it for a few days, so I can't really comment on reliability or quality. They really need to seek reviews from long time customers. It does not vibrate at all, and I am keen to see how it runs over the long term. I keep it in my family room, so I hope it continues to run quietly and vibration free. That said, I'm really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph B

customer_reviews.title: breaks after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item last year and it just started to lose the lighting on the digital display. It has a 1 year warranty but it has been 2 weeks after the 1 year date of purchase. They refused to exchange the product even though it was barely past. I was told they would do a courtesy exchange by the customer service person, then the warranty department denied it. I called and emailed multiple times and they haven't returned my messages. Do NOT buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent smaller wine storage unit
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality small storage unit for my nice cabs. I wish I has more room but this fits in my bar counter perfectly. Very, very happy with purchase,
customer_reviews.author: Let Me Drive

customer_reviews.title: Won't keep right temperature.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wine fridge in September 2018 and for awhile it worked great. For the last six months, I've noticed it won't keep the temperature that I set. Now, its stuck between 59-61 degrees which is far too high for white wines. I only store the white wines in the fridge and prefer to keep it at 54 degrees. I don't know how long a wine fridge is supposed to last but I would think at least a few years?
customer_reviews.author: Clemetric

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my delivery, I was looking to replace my NewAir Wine Refrigerator but upon my mate taking it out, it is too small and won't accommodate half of the bottles I had in older model. I will be calling to inquire about return policy. Dr. DeBorah Williams Newark, Delaware
customer_reviews.author: Dr. DeBorah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Photos online show 45Degrees - the lowest it will go is 54.
customer_reviews.text: product is nicely built and aesthetically pleasing but it will only go to 54 degrees. by design not the 45 shown in online photos. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The cooler arrived on time and in good condition. It was easy to set up and cooled to the appropriate temp quickly. We've had this for a few weeks and it is keeping our wines at the right temp. Also, love the interior light and its quiet. We are pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Scrappyjen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for use but arrived dented in back
customer_reviews.text: Overall love the fridge but it did come dented in the back like a lot of other reviews state so I have to give 4 stars. The wire shelves are removable which is handy for larger bottles. Inside light can be turned off and it’s quiet.
customer_reviews.author: K. JW

customer_reviews.title: Error code EE
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived, no visible damage to box or contents. Plugged unit in, display is flashing "EE" and not hearing any sounds from the item. Emailed Ivation support, received response in less than an hour that a support case was opened. Will update review based on customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. I can live with the one loose shelve  from nails loose and hard to get back in. But that aside it is very quiet
customer_reviews.text: It came with one of the wooden shelves loose from the nails and hard to get back. That aside it is quiet and got down to 54 degrees in a day and stays there. Looks nice. I can live with the one loose shelve as I put it on the bottom. Very quiet
customer_reviews.author: Steven Tiso

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says
customer_reviews.text: This is my third small wine cellar. So far it has only been in use a few days but I is so much quieter than previous models. I am very happy and hope it last longer than the others.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene H. Yates

customer_reviews.title: Great look and finish!
customer_reviews.text: Nice finish to it and great look. The racks were a little hard to move in and out since they have no rollers. Also a little small if you have the round bottles of wine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built in obsolesence??
customer_reviews.text: This is my second replacement. The unit is a simple and effective wine cooler and the price is reasonable. The problem is that they seem to have built in lifespan. The two units the preceded this both died after approximately 2 1/2 years. A good reason to purchase the guarantee with it.
customer_reviews.author: JJpeds

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Unit, looks nice in kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is amazing. Keeps the temperature as set, I paid extra for the stainless steel door, and was glad, as this makes the unit very attractive. The ship was quick, and arrived in perfect condition. I would highly suggest that instructions be included however, as some of the screws were not aligned and a small problem to put together. Overall, would recommend. Love It!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail L. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Good for small bottles only
customer_reviews.text: While it’s compact and quiet, it does NOT accommodate larger bottles. So, I can only fit 12 Pinot bottles in an 18 bottle fridge. Very frustrating. Keep this in mind before buying.
customer_reviews.author: David E Bannister

customer_reviews.title: Check what temperature your cooler goes too before you buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize this model only got down to 54 degrees...I only use white wine and it should be cooler. I would return it but it’s too big a pain. I never saw anything in the ad that said it wouldn’t get cooler
customer_reviews.author: Sally Bradbury

customer_reviews.title: Great wine cooler!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to keep our wine at a stable temperature. In the past we always had issues with our wine not being at serving temperature. This little cooler was a great solution. It works perfectly, looks really nice, and has a soft light to allow you to find what you're looking for. It is also whisper-quiet! I debated for a long time about this purchase and now wish I had bought it long ago. Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S

customer_reviews.title: Be sure your bottles will fit!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, this fridge is as advertised, we like it. But, this is a big but, most of our bottles are not tubular shaped, many reds are more pear shaped. The pear shaped do not fit without removing a rack, limiting the capacity of the fridge. We would probably take it back for more capacity, but it seems like a hassle due to the bulkiness of the return package
customer_reviews.author: woods

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bday present for wife and she loves it. She is an avid wine drinker and loves having her wine at just the right temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Keith H. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous unique solution, holds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect unique solution for keeping fruits and veggies fresh on my boat. All the shelves and the light makes it easy to see everything in there. Absolutely love it! Also room for bottles on the bottom rows.
customer_reviews.author: angela summerson

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. The only thing I must've missed is that the temperature does not get below 54 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks good
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he loves it. it looks just a described and works well. We have had it about a month now, and have not had any issues. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Teeny

customer_reviews.title: Returned and replacement received
customer_reviews.text: Unboxed the item and inspected for damage. No apparent damage. Read instructions. Assembled handle per instructions. Plugged into wall receptacle. No lights, no fan. Unit never started. Checked outlet. Outlet is fine. Received a replacement within a week. Works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar Land satisfied

customer_reviews.title: nice wine frig
customer_reviews.text: nice size for condo, small room or apartment. Very quiet. Handle was easy to install and racks are easy to slide in and out. Slight dent on top but doesn’t affect the product in working
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Worth its value
customer_reviews.text: The Ivation arrived promptly and was down to my desired temperature (62o F) in no time. It has maintained the temperatura for teh last week and I am stil to hear a noise. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Juan Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of it especially when the light is on. It took a little finesse getting the bottles to fit because the shelves are just a little too close together. Item arrived slightly damaged in the right rear top corner. I kept it anyway because it's barely visible and I didn't feel like dealing with returning such a bulky item.
customer_reviews.author: Daron Long

customer_reviews.title: Nice fridge but putting the handle on is harder than it should be.
customer_reviews.text: Prime came through and delivered Christmas Eve as they said they would when I placed the order. Putting the door handle on is a huge pain. You need a magnetized philips head to get the screw to seat correctly. It will not hold 18 bottles of wine. Seems quite. Let’s hope it gets to temperature or I will be hearing about it from my mother-in-law for whom I bought this as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W. Fitzsimmons

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Presentation
customer_reviews.text: I love the light inside of the cooler. The temperature is great. Very quiet. The outside of the cabinet is a great color and a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Pie

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's very functional and looks classy. No problems adjusting the temperature. Looks great in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Wine Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Very quite. Racks are a bit sticky depending on the bottle configuration, but nothing that can't be overcome.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon A. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: To me- the minimum temperature
customer_reviews.text: My fault-did not see in the product description that it only cools to 54 degrees. Not my fault- the unit is not bottle shape friendly. Many bottles would not fit in the shelving.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Wine time
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. The temperature indicator display light is extremely bright. Had to put tape over it.
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: Great little wine refrigerator.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking item to add to your kitchen/den/or wherever. It does hold 18 wine bottles and the controls are very easy to use. I would recommend this to anyone that likes their wine cool.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S. Eastep

customer_reviews.title: Quit working in a little over three weeks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my fridge on April 3, 2018, I followed all of the instructions for the set up and when I came home from work today my fridge was not working. Very disappointed that it would quit working within the same month of buying it. UPDATE 5/5/18: I returned the original fridge and I was refunded and contacted by the company immediately. I repurchased the fridge with the 4 year warranty. I will continue to improve the rating as the goes on if it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey V Cole

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Quality at a GREAT price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install; cooled to 54oF quickly; works well in tropical climate of Hawai'i!
customer_reviews.author: Lihue Louie

customer_reviews.title: I didn't want the wine to go bad as we'll be serving it to donors so I ...
customer_reviews.text: My work does a lot of events and we occasionally have leftover wine. I didn't want the wine to go bad as we'll be serving it to donors so I ordered the Ivation 18 wine refrigerator. So far, so good! I appreciate the locking system and it's very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Works but.....
customer_reviews.text: While this works, it came damaged TWICE. I kept it the second time as it is not easy to repack and return but it should come better packed to avoid dents.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Ivation 18 Bottle Thermoelectric Wine Cooler/Chiller - Door Lock - Counter Top Red & White Wine Cellar w/Digital Temperature Display, Freestanding Refrigerator Smoked Glass Door Quiet Operation Fridge
product_meta.description:
Style:18 Bottle with Door LockThe Ivation Wine Cooler keeps your wine at the correct & consistent temperature and stable environment, protecting the wine from exterior lights and elements, and is specially built to have zero vibration, so the wine could be aged and stored properly, enabling it to preserve and develop its delicious flavor, Color and Aroma, with the best possible mouthfeel, body, palette and finish, serving you the best and tastiest wine that is Full, Rich, Supple, Smooth, Round, and Balanced 

A Must Have for Wine Lovers and Collectors
The only way to properly protect your wine is to store them in the Ivation temperature-controlled beautifully designed wine cooler, even for short term storage. Serving temperature has a big effect on how a wine smells, tastes and feels in your mouth, even a very good wine can be awful at the wrong temperature, likewise improper temperature can also shorten the wine’s life or ruin the wine completely, Regular refrigerators are not an option, as they are too cold for most wines, and “Room temperature” is too warm. 

Features & Specifications
Maintains the perfect temperature for red and white wines
Efficient thermoelectric cooling
Low noise, low vibration – will not disturb sediment
Touch controls and LCD display
Soft interior lighting with on/off control
Tempered smoked glass door
Solid, CFC-free polyurethane foam insulation Rated Power: 65W
Temperature Range: 54º – 64ºF (12º – 18ºC)
Unit Dimensions: 13.5" x 20" x 25.4" (34.5 x 50.8 x 64.5cm)
Weight: Net: 32 lbs. (14.5kg), Gross: 36 lbs. (16.4kg)

 Impotent Tip: Do not put your wine cooler in the garage. The big temperature ranges of a garage will make the cooler run too often, shortening it’s life. 

 Buy with confident:If you need any help regarding any of our products don’t hesitate, we have a dedicated team ready to assist you please contact us at info@myivation.com or call 866-849-3049
feature_bullets: WINE COOLER (wine Cellar / Wine Chiller) A MUST HAVE: The only way to protect the quality and taste of your wines long or short term, and ensure it AGES at a consistent level, the wine has to be stored in the correct environment and CONSISTENT TEMPERATURE, (ideally in the range of 55° F) This free standing innovative wine cooler will protect your red or white wine, preserving its quality and rich flavors, so you could enjoy its real taste to the fullest.

PERFECT Stable TEMPERATURE: The Ivation cooler enables you to store your wines short & long term in a consistent stable temp environment, and allows you to customize the temp to one that creates an ideal climate for your wines ageing process (Range 54º – 64ºF (12º – 18ºC), therefore bringing out the true characteristics and full flavor of your wines in the long-term.

HUMIDITY, MINIMAL LIGHT: Insulated with Solid polyurethane heavy foam (CFC-free) & Closed with Thermopane doors that are tempered smoked, to ensure an interior odor-free environment that maintains constant humidity, keeping the cork from drying out, thus preventing more air to come into contact with the wine, also to ensure darkness, blocking out sunlight and harmful UV rays that breaks down the complex molecules that create the special flavors in properly aged wines.

NO VIBRATION & SUPER QUIET: Specially built with an Energy-efficient thermoelectric cooling system with no compressor, to minimize the vibration effect and noise, allowing your wine to age and settle properly, with no disturbance to its natural occurring sediments.

FEATURES: Sleek design with exterior digital Touch controls and LCD temp (°F/°C) Soft interior lighting with on/off control 100% Customer Satisfaction GUARANTEED we stand behind our products and pride ourselves with exceptional customer service care. If you need help please contact us at info@myivation.com or call 866-849-3049.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars880 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
